Question
========

Jody is taking three courses: English, History and Mathematics. Assume the probability that she will get an 8 in each course at the end of the semester:_____. \ P(grade 8 on the English exam) = 0.70. P(grade 8 on the History exam) = 0.60. P(grade 8 on the math exam) = 0.50. \ The events are independent of each other. Then what is the probability that Jody will not get an 8 in any subject?

Answerlist
----------

* 0,06
* 0,42
* 0,50
* 0,80

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.06: Correct
* 0.42: Incorrect
* 0.50: Incorrect
* 0.80: Incorrect
